items.sentence: Tom understands French a lot better than everyone thinks he does.
Tom walked into the kitchen with a fly swatter in his right hand.
Tom was wearing a dinner jacket when I saw him a few minutes ago.
Washington, D.C., is the capital of the United States of America.
We got stuck in a traffic jam, which made us twenty minutes late.
Tom thinks Mary is in Boston, but she\'s actually in Chicago now.
Tom swore to Mary that he wasn\'t the one who stole her necklace.
Tom claims that he accidentally shot Mary while cleaning his gun.
Tom knew that he didn\'t have enough money to buy what he wanted.
Tom went to school even though his doctor told him he shouldn\'t.
